title: Missing Summoner Icon
body:
I gifted a person during the Teemoing and was supposed to have my summoner Jack O Lantern Icon by the 3rd at the latest. I have yet to get it. I would appreciate actually being rewarded my icon since it costs real money.

Added: In fact when I look at my purchase history to look for my gift I sent a friend, it's not even there. I gifted Swain to a friend for the RP cost but it's not even showing. It did deduct the RP amount from me.

replies.body: The evil pumpkin icon as well as the other teemoing icons are still being sent out.  Our aim is to finish sending these icons by the 17th; though, some may see it sooner than others.  Hang tight!
Even after waiting till today I have yet to receive my icon.
Thanks so much! Just wanted to make sure.
what about the people wich disapear summoner icons? i've contacted the support, it was useless, still have the summoner icons missing, at least the championship riven is missing.
